Package projetofinalpoo

Class BookChapter

java.lang.Object
projetofinalpoo.Publication
projetofinalpoo.Book
projetofinalpoo.BookChapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Publication>
public class BookChapter
extends Book
A BookChapter is a child class of the Book class (which is a child class of the Publication class) so it inherits their methods and variables. A BookChapter is represented by its chapter name, its starting page, its ending page and all the variables that define a Book and a Publication.
See Also:
Publication, Book, Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • BookChapter

      public BookChapter()
      Sole constructor

    • BookChapter

      public BookChapter​(java.lang.String title, java.util.List<Researcher> author, java.lang.String summary, java.util.List<java.lang.String> keywords, int publicationYear, int audience, java.lang.String publisher, java.lang.String isbn, java.lang.String chapterName, int startingPage, int finalPage)
      Constructor that initializes the BookChapter, Book and Publications values (title, author, summary, keywords, publicationYear, audience, isbn, publisher, chapterName, startingPage and finalPage)
      Parameters:
      title - name of the title
      author - List of Researcher objects that made this BookChapter
      summary - description of this BookChapter
      keywords - List of Strings that describe this BookChapter
      publicationYear - year that this BookChapter was published
      audience - quantity of people to which this BookChapter was shown to
      isbn - the identifying code of a book
      publisher - name of the entity that published the Book where this BookChapter is
      chapterName - name of this BookChapter
      startingPage - number of the page where this chapter starts
      finalPage - number of the page where this chapter ends

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Method that describes the characteristics of a BookChapter. It returns a string in the following format:

      Title : __, Summary : __, Type : __

      Keywords : __

      Authors : __, Publication Year : __

      Publisher : __, ISBN : __

      Chapter name : __, Starting page : __, Final page : __ Note: __ is the place where the values are going to appear (they change object to object)

      Overrides:
      toString in class Book
      Returns:
      a String that describes a BookChapter object
